Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells are characterized by a high efficiency for converting chemical energy into electricity and fuel flexibility.
Titulo: Influence of the La0.2Sr0.7Ti0.95Ni0.05O3 (LSTN) Synthesis Method on SOFC Anode Performance

Sentencas: This research work focuses on developing durable and efficient anodes for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) based on exsolving nickel from the perovskite structure.
Titulo: Influence of the La0.2Sr0.7Ti0.95Ni0.05O3 (LSTN) Synthesis Method on SOFC Anode Performance

Sentencas: A-site-deficient La- and Ni-doped strontium titanates (La0.2Sr0.7Ti0.95Ni0.05O3-delta, LSTN) were synthesized using four different techniques and mixed with Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-delta (GDC) to form the SOFC anode.
Titulo: Influence of the La0.2Sr0.7Ti0.95Ni0.05O3 (LSTN) Synthesis Method on SOFC Anode Performance

Sentencas: The synthesis routes of interest for comparison included solid-state, sol-gel, hydrothermal, and co-precipitation methods.
Titulo: Influence of the La0.2Sr0.7Ti0.95Ni0.05O3 (LSTN) Synthesis Method on SOFC Anode Performance

Sentencas: LSTN powders were characterized via XRD, SEM, TPR, BET and XPS.
Titulo: Influence of the La0.2Sr0.7Ti0.95Ni0.05O3 (LSTN) Synthesis Method on SOFC Anode Performance

Sentencas: In situ XRD during reduction was measured and the reduced powders were analyzed using TEM.
Titulo: Influence of the La0.2Sr0.7Ti0.95Ni0.05O3 (LSTN) Synthesis Method on SOFC Anode Performance

Sentencas: The impact of synthesis route on SOFC performance was investigated.
Titulo: Influence of the La0.2Sr0.7Ti0.95Ni0.05O3 (LSTN) Synthesis Method on SOFC Anode Performance

Sentencas: All samples were highly durable when kept at 0.5 V for 48 h at 800 degrees C with H-2 fuel.
Titulo: Influence of the La0.2Sr0.7Ti0.95Ni0.05O3 (LSTN) Synthesis Method on SOFC Anode Performance

Sentencas: Interestingly, the best performance was observed for the cell with the LSTN anode prepared via co-precipitation, while the conventional solid-state synthesis method only achieved the second-best results.
Titulo: Influence of the La0.2Sr0.7Ti0.95Ni0.05O3 (LSTN) Synthesis Method on SOFC Anode Performance
